name: Reject This Game - Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3
name_original: Reject This Game - Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3
description:
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

I see myself working at RTG ELECTRIC Corp. It's been said that they care much about their employees.

Their motto is "The less you think, The more you smile!"

What could go wrong with such a philantrhropic corporation?

The selection process

YOU will assemble x512 H-Box 25c r2.0 ( C ). We are looking for people with talent for not thinking about stuff too much, and make repetitive tasks under pressure.

For making an actually accurate study, we will provide you with everything you need to stop thinking  to get your dream job!

What happens next?

If YOU SHOW US WHAT YOU GOT , you will get a H-Box 25c r2.0 ( C ) for yourself!

Totally FREE!

Experience TRUE JOY OF LIVING with this BEST-SELLING product! 

Why give me drugs?

Our CEO, Jerry Mc Bobin Jr. thinks that  0% neurone shark mode is real. We need you productive. We won't judge you !

We want YOU to quit thinking!
